title: G-Spot 2 Envy: The 4th Deadly Sin
description: In Part 4 of G-Spot 2: The Seven Deadly Sins...Juicy is facing a whole new set of problems!The grimy road of life takes more crazy twists and turns when Juicy-Mo hits the bricks and lands right back in the heart of Harlem!The chaos and danger she thought she’d escaped comes rushing back to haunt her as a blast from her past shows up in the basement of a funeral home!What’s next for the sexy Harlem stunna who just can’t seem to catch a break? Will she end up stretched out cool in a box, or will she escape the clutches of her destiny and live to fight another day?Find Out More InG-SPOT 2: THE SEVEN DEADLY SINS THE 4th DEADLY SIN
author: Noire
